sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
      <v-row>
        <v-col>
          <v-timeline>
            <v-timeline-item
              v-for="(day, index) in itinerary"
              :key="index"
              :color="getTimelineColor(index)"
            >
              <v-timeline-item-icon>
                <v-icon>{{ getTimelineIcon(index) }}</v-icon>
              </v-timeline-item-icon>
  
              <v-timeline-item-content>
                <v-card>
                  <v-row>
                    <v-col cols="12" md="4">
                      <!-- Display image for the day -->
                      <v-img :src="getDayImage(day.title)" height="150"></v-img>
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col cols="12" md="8">
                      <v-card-title class="headline">{{ day.title }}</v-card-title>
                      <v-card-text>
                        <!-- Display activities for the day with images -->
                        <v-list>
                          <v-list-item v-for="(activity, i) in day.activities" :key="i">
                            <v-list-item-avatar>
                              <v-img :src="getActivityImage(activity)" size="40"></v-img>
                            </v-list-item-avatar>
                            <v-list-item-content>{{ activity }}</v-list-item-content>
                          </v-list-item>
                        </v-list>
                      </v-card-text>
                    </v-col>
                  </v-row>
                </v-card>
              </v-timeline-item-content>
            </v-timeline-item>
          </v-timeline>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
  data() {
    return {
      itinerary: [
        {
          title: 'Day 1',
          activities: [
            { name: 'Morning Hike', image: 'morning_hike.jpg' },
            { name: 'Visit Museum', image: 'museum.jpg' },
            { name: 'Lunch at Local Restaurant', image: 'lunch.jpg' },
          ],
        },
        {
          title: 'Day 2',
          activities: [
            { name: 'Explore City Landmarks', image: 'landmarks.jpg' },
            { name: 'Afternoon Spa', image: 'spa.jpg' },
            { name: 'Dinner at Waterfront', image: 'dinner.jpg' },
          ],
        },
        // Add more days as needed
      ],
    };
  },
  // ...
};
</script>
